Text: Bless you ! Thanks for honouring a request.

Hi SectorVector, 
I have saved you about $200!
So now how about going for that scanner?
In that case, i would spend the money on a printed copy or some other good book ! Lets see. In time maybe.

If efficient navigation through a 1400 page ebook is important to you, you'd probably be better off with the following fully bookmarked and accurately paginated PDF. BONUS: 90 MB lighter to download and seed to a 1:1 ratio.
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7731743/Petrucci_General_Chemistry_10th.7z

Thanks dynstab. Noticed your comment rather late. Will get that (too). Good to see you back. :)

(Aside: I wish those yellow ballons indicating comments, show up in a different colour if there is a 'newer' comment. Am going to try putting it up as a suggestion.)
Thanks so much for the upload.  Does anyone know where I can find the solutions manual, if it actually exists?
